context_of_use: This use case allows customers to complete purchases using available payment and shipping options.
stakeholders_and_interests: customer: wants to complete purchases conveniently
description: Allow customers to complete purchases using available payment and shipping options.
preconditions: Customer has items in the cart.
Customer is logged into their account.
postconditions: Order is recorded in the system.
assumptions: Customer has selected items to purchase.
Customer has a valid payment method.
requirements_met: The system shall allow customers to checkout using multiple payment methods.
main_flow: 1. Customer initiates checkout → System displays available payment and shipping options.
2. Customer selects payment method → System processes the payment.
3. Customer confirms shipping details → System finalizes the order.
